title: Aston Martin Launches the Bespoke .1R Road Bike
content:
Aston Martin and British titanium bicycle leader J.Laverack have united to create a road bicycle without equal; the J.Laverack Aston Martin .1R.

Read the full article at Aston Martin Launches the Bespoke .1R Road Bike on Velo.
author: Troy Templin
